activities.loc: Branch I, Courthouse Annex, Second Floor

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
9:02 AM Defendant Robert L. McDermid appeared by ZOOM, in custody at Oconto County Jail.  Attorney Christopher T. Froelich appeared by ZOOM for Robert L. McDermid.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty Froelich heard - has received an offer from ADA.
Has also just received new files for his cases in Shawano and Oconto counties.
Requests another status to try to consolidate all of these cases.
ADA heard and has no objection.
Court heard and schedules one more status conference with parties.
9:06 AM
Status conference scheduled for January 6, 2023 at 01:45 pm.
Letter to Judge Sequin regarding scheduling - Response from Judge re: rescheduling request - Judge approval for ZOOM 10-31-22

10:30 AM Defendant Robert L. McDermid appeared by ZOOM video (@ Oconto Co jail).  Attorney Christopher T. Froelich in court for Robert L. McDermid.  Prosecuting attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Atty Froelich is heard, requests one more status (due to Def's other cases/matters)
ADA agrees
10:34 AM
Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Letter to Judge Sequin requesting phone appearance - Phone request DENIED by Judge

3:17 PM Prosecuting attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Robert L. McDermid appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Christopher T. Froelich appeared by zoom for Robert L. McDermid. 
Copy of info
Waives reading
Pleads n/g
Requests STC 
3:21PM
Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.addlTxt:
08:55 AM Defendant Robert L. McDermid in court with attorney Christopher T. Froelich.  DeShea D. Morrow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court calls case and appears by ZOOM means.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Froelich is heard - has reviewed with deft.
Deft understands.
Waives formal readings.
Request prelim and waives time limits.
Court schedules.
8:57 AM
  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

Adjustment Number: 22A 001131,
Payable Number: 89249,
Receipt Number: 22R 001905,
Amount: $20.00

09:44 AM Defendant Robert L. McDermid in court.  DeShea D. Morrow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court calls case.
Deft heard - rec'd a text from atty this morning saying she could not appear today.
DA heard and provides a copy of the complaint to Atty Crowell.
Atty Crowell heard - will need to complete a conflict check.
Deft to complete dean paperwork.
Court schedules with parties.
9:48 AM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

08:39 AM Defendant Robert L. McDermid in court.  Kathryn E Heineck appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court calls case. 
Deft is being heard-believed that he had counsel but it was determined from Atty Jacovini that there was a conflict of interest.
Does not qualify for Public Defender and is able to afford to hire an attorney on own.
Deft will contact attorney.
Court schedules with parties. 
8:42 AM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

01:44 PM Defendant Robert L. McDermid in court with attorney Jevon Jones Jaconi.  Defendant Robert L. McDermid in custody.  Kathryn E Heineck appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Robert L. McDermid appeared by ZOOM means with Attorney.
Court calls case.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Atty Jaconi heard - has reviewd charges and penalties w/ deft and deft understands.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Jaconi heard on bond.
Court imposes $5,000 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx, no contact with J.C., Nimrod Inn, K.W., or P.V. 
1:49 PM

  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
